text: David Van Cortland Crosby (August 14, 1941 - January 18, 2023) was an American guitarist, singer and songwriter. He was most famous as a founding member of the bands The Byrds and Crosby, Stills, and Nash. He was born in Los Angeles, California. In the 2020 presidential election, Crosby supported Vermont United States Senator Bernie Sanders. Crosby died suddenly on the night of January 18, 2023 at his home in Santa Ynez, California. He was 81. The cause of death was problems caused by COVID-19. == References == Category:American guitarists Category:Musicians from Los Angeles Category:American folk musicians Category:American rock musicians Category:Organ transplant recipients Category:Singers from Los Angeles Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in California Category:1941 births Category:2023 deaths
title: David Crosby
